refsect1.programlisting:
<CsoundSynthesizer> <CsOptions> ; Audio out Audio in -odac -iadc -M0 ;;;RT audio I/O and RT midi </CsOptions> <CsInstruments>
sr = 44100 ksmps = 100 nchnls = 2
giengine fluidEngine ; soundfont path to manual/examples isfnum fluidLoad "07AcousticGuitar.sf2", giengine, 1 fluidProgramSelect giengine, 1, isfnum, 0, 0
instr 1 mididefault 60, p3 midinoteonkey p4, p5 ikey init p4 ivel init p5
fluidNote giengine, 1, ikey, ivel endin
instr 99 imvol init 120000 asigl, asigr fluidOut giengine outs asigl * imvol, asigr * imvol endin
</CsInstruments> <CsScore>
i 1 0 3600 60 100 i 99 0 3600 e
</CsScore> </CsoundSynthesizer>
